name: Slime Jump (RubySword)
description:
Kill all of the balloons and collect all coins to try to get the highest score! Beat the game quickly to try to climb the ranks on the leaderboard and be number 1!

All skins function the same, but 2 are unlockable.

The game probably won't save, but the leaderboard will.

If the game gets enough support, I might add another level.

This is my first game so it's not anything crazy.
